data.title: Sometimes a movie has a sequel that's so bad it taints the memory of the original. So, what movies do you wish never received a sequel?
data.content: I love everything about this movie. Immortals hiding among us, fighting with swords, respecting holy ground, coming at last to the Gathering. Men in kilts—a lot. Magnificent. Stirring, mysterious, romantic, and just a weeeee bit camp. Satisfying ending ties everything up nicely.
